metadata.title: CVE-2021-38173 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Btrbk before 0.31.2 allows command execution because of the mishandling ofremote hosts filtering SSH commands using ssh_filter_btrbk.sh inauthorized_keys.

criterions.comment: btrbk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
